name: Legendary Amazing Stuntman
description:
The amazing stunts water park heros is here. Get ready for an amazing stuntman racing. Perform stunning stunts make jumps. This legendary running game is full of adventures and amazing obstacles. Feel the thrill of stun runner and cross the legendary and amazing hurdles and obstacles in this wonder extreme daredevil stunt and water run adventure game. You are supposed to be the player that has to defeat fear of fury riding. Begun the race from running on ramp. One after the other exciting levels of ultimate chase in rush is waiting for most daring player. Multiple level and multiple character selection make game more adventure. So why are you waiting come and join this game.
Features:
-Mutiple level and select your favourite stuntman male & female
-3D Graphics and Sounds
-Smooth and easy controls.
-Different Hurdle & stunt and racing
-Amazing running & jumping Animation
-Race as fast as possible
